mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into quartz_job (name, description, cron, job_class, job_group, status, create_time, create_by, finish_time, finish_by) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cron,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{finishBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update quartz_job set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cron = #{cron,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job_class = #{jobClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job_group = #{jobGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, finish_by = #{finishBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, description, cron, job_class, job_group, status, create_time, create_by, finish_time, finish_by from quartz_job where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, description, cron, job_class, job_group, status, create_time, create_by, finish_time, finish_by from quartz_job
